response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will bring significant benefits to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a purchase price of $14,000. This offer allows us both to benefit from this opportunity while ensuring a fair transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 14000}
